In England, in the seven days to 23 May, there were 13,575 new confirmed cases (24.1 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 16 May, there were 11,540 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 18% (2,035 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 28 May is 3,908,214 (6,943.4 cases per 100,000 population).
